body:
This commit adds an option to the:
```
spack external find
```
command that allows it to search by tags. In this way group of executables with common purposes can be grouped under a single name and a simple command can be used to detect all of them. As an example introduce the "build-tools" tag to search for common development tools on a system.

Example of use:
```console
% spack external find -t build-tools
==> The following specs have been detected on this system and added to /Users/culpo/.spack/packages.yaml
autoconf@2.69  automake@1.16.2  cmake@3.19.1  flex@2.5.35  gmake@3.81  libtool@2.4.6  m4@1.4.6  pkgconf@1.7.3
```
title: spack external find: allow to search by tags
